transforms.code:
sorted_data = sorted(value, key=lambda x: x['filler_name'].lower() if x['filler_name'] else "")
	return sorted_data

config.script:
if event.rowIndex == self.parent.custom.rowSelected:
	
		self.parent.parent.getChild("existing").getChild("table").props.selection.selectedColumn=None
		self.parent.parent.getChild("existing").getChild("table").props.selection.selectedRow=None
		self.parent.custom.rowSelected=-1
		
		
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("line_type").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("line_name").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_name").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("scale_name").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_unit").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("limits").getChild("tolerance").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("limits").getChild("sp_high").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("limits").getChild("sp").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("limits").getChild("sp_low").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_weight").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_sp_high").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_sp").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_sp_low").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_material").props.params.value.entry=''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject").props.params.value = {"condition": '',"entry": '',"flag": True}
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_metal").props.params.value = {"condition": '',"entry": '',"flag": True}
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject_over").props.params.value = {"condition": '',"entry": '',"flag": True}
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject_under").props.params.value = {"condition": '',"entry": '',"flag": True}
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject_metal").props.params.value = {"condition": '',"entry": '',"flag": True}
	
	else:
	
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("line_type").props.params.value.entry=event.value['type_name']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("line_name").props.params.value.entry=event.value['line_name']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_name").props.params.value.entry=event.value['filler_name']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("scale_name").props.params.value.entry=event.value['scale_name']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_unit").props.params.value.entry=event.value['filler_unit']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("limits").getChild("tolerance").props.params.value.entry=event.value['filler_tolerance']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("limits").getChild("sp_high").props.params.value.entry=event.value['filler_sp_high']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("limits").getChild("sp").props.params.value.entry=event.value['filler_sp']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("limits").getChild("sp_low").props.params.value.entry=event.value['filler_sp_low']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_weight").props.params.value.entry=event.value['tag_weight']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_sp_high").props.params.value.entry=event.value['tag_sp_high']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_sp").props.params.value.entry=event.value['tag_sp']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_sp_low").props.params.value.entry=event.value['tag_sp_low']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_material").props.params.value.entry=event.value['tag_material']
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject").props.params.value = {"condition": event.value['tag_reject_value'],"entry": event.value['tag_reject'],"flag": True if event.value.get('tag_reject_value') is None else False}
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_metal").props.params.value = {"condition": event.value['tag_metal_value'],"entry": event.value['tag_metal'],"flag": True if event.value.get('tag_metal_value') is None else False}
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject_over").props.params.value = {"condition": event.value['tag_reject_over_value'],"entry": event.value['tag_reject_over'],"flag": True if event.value.get('tag_reject_over_value') is None else False}
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject_under").props.params.value = {"condition": event.value['tag_reject_under_value'],"entry": event.value['tag_reject_under'],"flag": True if event.value.get('tag_reject_under_value') is None else False}
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject_metal").props.params.value = {"condition": event.value['tag_reject_metal_value'],"entry": event.value['tag_reject_metal'],"flag": True if event.value.get('tag_reject_metal_value') is None else False}
		
		self.parent.custom.rowSelected=event.rowIndex

transforms.code:
# Format and sort the names 
	formatted_names = sorted([{"value": item["type_name"], "label": item["type_name"]} for item in value],key=lambda x: x['label'].lower())
	return formatted_names

# Format and sort the names 
	formatted_names = sorted([{"value": item["line_name"], "label": item["line_name"]} for item in value],key=lambda x: x['label'].lower())
	return formatted_names

# Format and sort the names 
	formatted_names = sorted([{"value": item["filler_name"], "label": item["filler_name"]} for item in value],key=lambda x: x['label'].lower())
	return formatted_names

unique_names = set()
	for item in value:
	    item_name = item.get("scale_name")
	    if item_name is not None:
	        unique_names.add(item_name)
	
	# Format the unique names in the desired structure
	formatted_names = [{"value": name, "label": name} for name in unique_names]
	
	# Sort the formatted names by 'value'
	formatted_names = sorted(formatted_names, key=lambda x: x['label'].lower())

	# Return the formatted list
	return formatted_names

unique_names = set()
	for item in value:
	    item_name = item.get("unit_name")
	    if item_name is not None:
	        unique_names.add(item_name)
	
	# Format the unique names in the desired structure
	formatted_names = [{"value": name, "label": name} for name in unique_names]
	
	# Sort the formatted names by 'value'
	formatted_names = sorted(formatted_names, key=lambda x: x['label'].lower())

	# Return the formatted list
	return formatted_names

config.script:
''' 
	###########################################################################################################################
	First check the type. If it doesn't exist add it
	###########################################################################################################################
	'''
	type_name = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("type_name").props.params.value.entry
	
	if type_name== '':
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Type Failed'
		self.props.value = 0
		return
		
	params = {'type_name': type_name}		
		
	# Check if entry already exists:
	count = system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Scalar/Count_Type', params)
	if count ==0:
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Writing Type'
		system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Insert/Insert_Type', params)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("type_name").refreshBinding("props.params.options")
	else:
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Type Exists'
	
	# Getting type_id
	type_id = system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Scalar/Get_Type_ID', params)
		
	''' 
	###########################################################################################################################
	Next check line. If it doesn't exist add it
	###########################################################################################################################
	'''
	site_id = 10 #self.parent.parent.getChild("CurrentSite").props.params.site_id
	line_name = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("line_name").props.params.value.entry
	line_material = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("line_material").props.params.value.entry
		
	if line_name== '':
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Line Failed'
		self.props.value = 0
		return
		
	params = 	{	'type_id': 			type_id,
					'site_id': 			site_id,
					'line_name': 		line_name
				}
		
	# Check if entry already exists:
	count = system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Scalar/Count_Line', params)
	if count ==0:
	
		params2 = 	{	'type_id': 			type_id,
						'site_id': 			site_id,
						'line_name': 		line_name,
						'line_material': 	line_material
					}
	
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Writing Line'
		system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Insert/Insert_Line', params2)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("line_name").refreshBinding("props.params.options")
	else:
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Line Exists'

	# Getting line_id
	line_id = system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Scalar/Get_Line_ID', params)
	
	''' 
	###########################################################################################################################
	Next check unit. If it doesn't exist add it
	###########################################################################################################################
	'''
	unit_name = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("unit_name").props.params.value.entry
	
	if unit_name== '':
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Unit Failed'
		self.props.value = 0
		return
		
	params = {'unit_name': unit_name}
		
	# Check if entry already exists:
	count = system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Scalar/Count_Unit', params)
	if count ==0:
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Writing Unit'
		system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Insert/Insert_Unit', params)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("unit_name").refreshBinding("props.params.options")
	else:
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Unit Exists'
	
	# Getting unit_id
	unit_id = system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Scalar/Get_Unit_ID', params)
		
	''' 
	###########################################################################################################################
	Next check filler. If it doesn't exist add it
	###########################################################################################################################
	'''
	
	filler_name = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_name").props.params.value.entry
	filler_design = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_limits").getChild("filler_design").props.params.value.entry
	filler_sp_low = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_limits").getChild("filler_sp_low").props.params.value.entry
	filler_sp = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_limits").getChild("filler_sp").props.params.value.entry
	filler_sp_high = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_limits").getChild("filler_sp_high").props.params.value.entry
	filler_sp_low_tag = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_sp_low_tag").props.params.value.entry
	filler_sp_tag = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_sp_tag").props.params.value.entry
	filler_sp_high_tag = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_sp_high_tag").props.params.value.entry
	filler_reject = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_reject").props.params.value.entry
	filler_reject_cond = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_reject").props.params.value.condition
	filler_metal = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_metal").props.params.value.entry
	filler_metal_cond = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_metal").props.params.value.condition
	filler_reason_over = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_reason_over").props.params.value.entry
	filler_reason_over_cond = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_reason_over").props.params.value.condition
	filler_reason_under = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_reason_under").props.params.value.entry
	filler_reason_under_cond = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_reason_under").props.params.value.condition
	filler_reason_metal = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_reason_metal").props.params.value.entry
	filler_reason_metal_cond = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_reason_metal").props.params.value.condition
	
	
	if not filler_name or not filler_design or not filler_sp_low or not filler_sp or not filler_sp_high:
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Filler Failed'
		self.props.value = 0
		return
		
	params = 	{	'line_id': 						line_id,
					'unit_id': 						unit_id,
					'filler_name': 					filler_name
				}
				
		
	# Check if entry already exists:
	count = system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Scalar/Count_Filler', params)
	if count ==0:
	
		params2 = 	{	'line_id': 						line_id,
						'unit_id': 						unit_id,
						'filler_name': 					filler_name,
						'filler_design': 				filler_design,
						'filler_sp_low': 				filler_sp_low,
						'filler_sp': 					filler_sp,
						'filler_sp_high': 				filler_sp_high,
						'filler_sp_low_tag': 			filler_sp_low_tag,
						'filler_sp_tag': 				filler_sp_tag,
						'filler_sp_high_tag': 			filler_sp_high_tag,
						'filler_reject': 				filler_reject,
						'filler_reject_cond': 			filler_reject_cond,
						'filler_metal': 				filler_metal,
						'filler_metal_cond': 			filler_metal_cond,
						'filler_reason_over': 			filler_reason_over,
						'filler_reason_over_cond':		filler_reason_over_cond,	
						'filler_reason_under': 		filler_reason_under,
						'filler_reason_under_cond':	filler_reason_under_cond,	
						'filler_reason_metal': 		filler_reason_metal,
						'filler_reason_metal_cond':	filler_reason_metal_cond				
					}
					
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Writing Filler'
		system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Insert/Insert_Filler', params2)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_name").refreshBinding("props.params.options")
	else:
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Filler Exists'

	# Getting filler_id
	filler_id = system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Scalar/Get_Filler_ID', params)

	
	''' 
	###########################################################################################################################
	Last but not least: Check Scale. Add it if it doesn't exist,
	###########################################################################################################################
	'''
	
	scale_name = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("scale_name").props.params.value.entry
	scale_weight = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("scale_weight").props.params.value.entry
	
	if not scale_name or not scale_weight:
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Scale Failed'
		self.props.value = 0
		return
		
	params = 	{	'filler_id': 		filler_id,
					'scale_name':		scale_name
				}
		
	# Check if entry already exists:
	count = system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Scalar/Count_Scale', params)
	if count ==0:
	
		params2 = 	{	'filler_id': 		filler_id,
						'scale_name':		scale_name,
						'scale_weight':		scale_weight
					}
	
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Writing Scale'
		system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Insert/Insert_Scale', params2)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("scale_name").refreshBinding("props.params.options")
	else:
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Scale Exists'
		
	self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_name").refreshBinding("props.params.options")
	self.view.refreshBinding("custom.query")
	self.props.value = 0

''' 
	###########################################################################################################################
	First check the type. If it doesn't exist add it
	###########################################################################################################################
	'''
	type_name = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("line_type").props.params.value.entry
	params = {'type_name': type_name}
	
	if type_name== '':
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Failed'
		self.props.value = 0
		return
		
	# Check if entry already exists:
	count = system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Scalar/Count_Type', params)
	if count ==0:
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Writing Type'
		system.db.runNamedQuery('Weight_Q/DB_Insert/Insert_Type', params)
	else:
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Type Exists'
	
	
	
	
	
	self.props.value = 0
	'''
	    
	# /////////////////// Working on line entry next ///////////////////////
	line_name = self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("line_name").props.params.value.entry
	site_id = self.parent.parent.getChild("CurrentSite").props.params.site_id
	
	if line_name== '':
		self.props.writingState.text = 'Failed'
		self.props.value = 0
		return
	
	# Define the SQL query to check if the line_name exists already
	check_query = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM weight.dbo.line WHERE site_id =? AND line_name = ? AND type_name = ?"
	check_params = [site_id,line_name,type_name]
	result = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery(check_query, check_params)
	
	# If the line_name does not exist, insert it
	if result == 0:
	    self.props.writingState.text = 'Adding Line'
	    insert_query = "INSERT INTO weight.dbo.line (site_id,line_name,type_name) VALUES (?,?,?)"
	    insert_params = [site_id,line_name,type_name]
	    system.db.runPrepUpdate(insert_query, insert_params)
	else:
	    self.props.writingState.text = 'Line Exists'
	    
	# Getting Line ID
	check_query = "SELECT line_id FROM weight.dbo.line WHERE site_id =? AND line_name = ? AND type_name = ?"
	check_params = [site_id,line_name,type_name]
	line_id = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery(check_query, check_params)
	    
	# /////////////////// And finally the filler entries ///////////////////////
	
	insert_query = '''INSERT INTO weight.dbo.filler 	(line_id,filler_name,filler_unit,filler_tolerance,filler_sp_high,filler_sp,filler_sp_low,tag_sp_high,tag_sp, tag_sp_low,
														tag_reject,tag_metal,tag_reject_over,tag_reject_under,tag_reject_metal,
														tag_reject_value,tag_metal_value,tag_reject_over_value,tag_reject_under_value,tag_reject_metal_value) 
														VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)'''

	insert_params = [	line_id,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_name").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("filler_unit").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("limits").getChild("tolerance").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("limits").getChild("sp_high").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("limits").getChild("sp").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("limits").getChild("sp_low").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_sp_high").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_sp").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_sp_low").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_metal").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject_over").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject_under").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject_metal").props.params.value.entry,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject").props.params.value.condition,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_metal").props.params.value.condition,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject_over").props.params.value.condition,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject_under").props.params.value.condition,
						self.parent.parent.getChild("setup").getChild("tag_reject_metal").props.params.value.condition ]

	system.db.runPrepUpdate(insert_query, insert_params)

	# Refresh and clean-up
	self.view.refreshBinding("custom.query")
	self.props.value = 0
	'''
